metadata.name: Haqdamat Sefer ha-Zohar #1/3
metadata.description:
A gif in an edition of three based on a watercolor exegesis of the Zohar.  
30"x22.5" ink, watercolors & pencil on paper 2009  
In the: The Escalette Permanent Collection of Art | Chapman University, CA

“As He verged on creating the world, all the letters presented themselves  
before Him, from last to first.”
